actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: A bill to rescind budget authority for the Department of Housing and Urban Development for community development grants (rescission numbered R87-46) proposed to be rescinded in a special message transmitted to the Congress by the President on January 5, 1987, in accordance with section 1012 of the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.
subjects: Department of Housing and Urban Development

summary.text: Rescinds budget authority for Department of Housing and Urban Development community development grants (R87-46).

titles.title: A bill to rescind budget authority for the Department of Housing and Urban Development for community development grants (rescission numbered R87-46) proposed to be rescinded in a special message transmitted to the Congress by the President on January 5, 1987, in accordance with section 1012 of the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.
